name: Heavy Rains
description:
Createdfor the O2A2 Visual Novel Jam on Itch.io.
- 1000 words with 3 choices (that give you a bit more info about my world)
- 1 ending
- 1 sprite with 8 expressions
- 1 background
- 1 music track
- 1 sound effect (rain used 2 times for a short period)

I plan on expanding this story in a new game in the future as well as adding a few new features to this once the jam is well past over and when I have the time.

The things I plan to add (just for fun) are as follows:
- extra outfits for Chelsie.
- custom GUI (game user interface)
- Option to add a name for the MC
- CG for the ending.
- Gallary for the sprite emotions and CG.

Thanks for taking the time to look and an even bigger thanks to those of you who take your time to try out my little visual novel!

Gained an achievement for the O2A2 Visual Novel Jam!
Thanks so much ATP Projects!
